Like every other shooter game ive played it has a frustrating skill gap, everytime i get back to this game i have to grind for a while till i regain my aim and game sense. at peak back when i played this 2 to 3 hrs a day in march 2020 This game was a blast however the games at its lowest when the servers are buggy and the matchmaking is bad. i got this game back when it was 20 bucks i dont regret it and now that its free i think everyonnne should play it. Its a ununique unique shooter game. its so basic in that theyre no classes to make every single player special but thats where the fun is, in games like overwatch u rely on certain classes and if they have bad players u loose, cs go has a insane carry poteintial for a single pearson and the mechanics although i admit are a bit wonky at times are refined and reliable.
